name: email-monitor
description: Check for new client emails every 15 minutes
timezone_note: Schedule runs in the server timezone configured via timedatectl on the Droplet (see YOUR_TIMEZONE in .env.example)
prompt: Check for unread emails from clients. For each new email: (1) download any scope document attachments, (2) extract project details (client name, address, bid amount, scope of work), (3) create or update the project tracking sheet, (4) calculate the 80/20 pay split, (5) send WhatsApp messages to available crew members with job details. Mark processed emails as read.
